name: Blobby
description: An adorable young dragon that loves creating and playing with bubbles. Its innocent nature hides surprising draconic power.

ability.name: Bubble Play
ability.description: Water moves create protective bubbles that reduce incoming damage by 25% for 2 turns.

moves.name: Bubble Beam
moves.description: Sprays bubbles that may lower speed.

moves.name: Dragon Breath
moves.description: Exhales a draconic breath that may paralyze.

moves.name: Aqua Tail
moves.description: Swings its tail like a wave to attack.

moves.name: Play Nice
moves.description: Lowers the target's attack in a friendly way.

habitat: Crystal clear lakes and dragon nurseries
